title: Bloomberg Markets: Lorin Says Endowment Returns up 12%

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Lorin Higher Education Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing a positive year for endowment returns driven by global equities.
